title: How do I set my phone to vibrate or mute quickly?
answer:
1、From the home screen or main menu screen (other than when you are playing multi-media files), press and hold the volume down button. The vibration mode follows the silent mode.  
2、Touch Settings > Sound > Vibrate to set the phone to vibrate. To mute the phone, select Ringer Volume, which is on the same menu page as the Vibrate option, and then drag the volume bar all the way to the left.
